meta.script: {"@context":"https://schema.org","@graph":[{"@type":"WebSite","@id":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/#website","url":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/","name":"Lanka Business News","description":"One Stop Portal for Sri Lanka's Business News","publisher":{"@id":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/#organization"},"potentialAction":[{"@type":"SearchAction","target":{"@type":"EntryPoint","urlTemplate":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/?s={search_term_string}"},"query-input":{"@type":"PropertyValueSpecification","valueRequired":true,"valueName":"search_term_string"}}],"inLanguage":"en-US"},{"@type":"Organization","@id":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/#organization","name":"Lanka Business News","url":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/","logo":{"@type":"ImageObject","inLanguage":"en-US","@id":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/#/schema/logo/image/","url":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/lankabusinessnews-logo.png","contentUrl":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/lankabusinessnews-logo.png","width":321,"height":89,"caption":"Lanka Business News"},"image":{"@id":"https://www.lankabusinessnews.com/#/schema/logo/image/"},"sameAs":["https://www.facebook.com/LankaBusinessNews/","https://x.com/lbnbusinessnews","https://www.instagram.com/lankabusinessnewssl/","https://www.linkedin.com/company/lanka-business-news-pvt-ltd-","https://www.youtube.com/user/lankabusinessnews"]}]}

span.class: btIco btIcoDefaultType btIcoMediumSize btIcoAccentColor btIconCircleShape btFooterLargeTitle

div.p: Lanka Business News is amongst the leading online Business News portals in Sri Lanka, unique for its focus on contemporary business news relevant across multiple industries operating in the country. We present not only the news, but a perspective based on observations and possible implications of a prevailing news item. LBN also provides an insight to the impact of a global economic or industrial development, thus helping stakeholders make informed and calculated decisions.
